borrow-bnusd.title: Borrow Balanced Dollars
borrow-bnusd.description: Learn how to deposit collateral, borrow bnUSD, optimise your risk, and close your position.

claim-rewards.title: Claim rewards
claim-rewards.description: Learn how to earn and claim Balance Tokens and network fees.

incentivise-liquidity.title: Incentivise liquidity pools
incentivise-liquidity.description: Learn how to influence the BALN incentives for each liquidity pool.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.description: The documentation site for Balanced, a DeFi project that’s home to the Balanced Dollar stablecoin (bnUSD), and includes an exchange to service all blockchains connected to the ICON Network.

lock-baln.title: Lock up Balance Tokens
lock-baln.description: Learn how to lock up Balance Tokens to get Boosted BALN (bBALN).

manage-assets.title: View and manage assets
manage-assets.description: Learn how to view and manage assets in your wallet.

participate-governance.title: Participate in governance
participate-governance.description: Learn where to discuss potential changes to Balanced, how to vote on the changes proposed, and submit a proposal of your own.

security.title: Security
security.description: Learn about the measures Balanced takes to keep its users safe.

supply-liquidity.title: Supply liquidity
supply-liquidity.description: Learn how to supply assets to a liquidity pool on Balanced.

swap-assets.title: Swap assets
swap-assets.description: Learn how to swap assets on the Balanced decentralised exchange.

technical/liquidation-bot.title: Liquidation bot
technical/liquidation-bot.description: Learn how to cover the debt of under-collateralised positions and earn up to a 10% profit.

technical/smart-contracts.title: Smart contracts
technical/smart-contracts.description: View all the smart contracts associated with Balanced.

technical/white-paper.title: White paper
technical/white-paper.description: Learn about the token economics and technical details of Balanced.

transfer-cross-chain.title: Transfer assets cross-chain
transfer-cross-chain.description: Learn how to move assets between ICON and supported blockchains.

troubleshooting.title: Troubleshooting
troubleshooting.description: If you’re having trouble using Balanced, you can find solutions to common problems here.
